about_the_game:
WELCOME O-RINN

Age: 39 years old

Zodiac Sign: Pisces

Preferences: Bondage, deep blowjob, double penetration.

O-Rinn is a legendary figure in Echo City — this woman operates like a spider weaving invisible threads, orchestrating the city's players from behind the scenes. Yet, she avoids the spotlight, never appearing in the news or at public events. O-Rinn is reserved, powerful, and cunning — a true "éminence grise."

WHAT YOU'RE GETTING

From now on, O-Rinn will become not only your dedicated companion but your enigmatic muse! O-Rinn will always keep you company on the main screen with her elegant animations and intriguing dialogs.

By purchasing this DLC, you get the O-Rinn mascot! You can switch your mascot at any time by opening your profile and choosing the "Mascot" tab.

Along with the mascot, you're getting 5000 credits and 150 super serum.

But most importantly, you're getting our undying gratitude! Thank you for considering purchasing this DLC!

content_descriptors.notes: All characters in the game are over 20 years old. This DLC contains explicit adult themes, including nudity and sexual acts. Please be aware and ensure that you are in an appropriate location before playing to avoid causing distress to others.

name: Lust Goddess — Mascot O-Rinn
short_description: Unlock a unique mascot, O-Rinn, to entertain you every time you visit the main screen! Enjoy Lust Goddess with this super sidekick and some extra resources to boost your progress.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
